subject: Sleep
title: The Future of Sleep
description: A short lesson to help you apply The Future of Sleep.

hook.text: Scientists are developing technologies to enhance sleep artificially. The question is: should we?

buildup.text: Transcranial stimulation can boost slow waves during sleep, potentially enhancing memory consolidation.

discovery.text: Acoustic stimulation timed to brain waves has shown a 25 percent improvement in memory recall after sleep.

twist.text: If we can enhance sleep artificially, inequality could widen. Enhanced sleep might become a luxury for the wealthy.

climax.text: The ethical questions around sleep enhancement mirror debates about cognitive enhancement and human augmentation.

punchline.text: The future of sleep might be engineered, not earned.

quiz.question: What ethical concern does sleep enhancement technology raise?
options: Enhanced sleep could become a luxury, widening inequality
